Author: ComputerGenie ğŸ‘´ğŸ¼ğŸ“¢#7004
Content:
run htop on Server 1 and check to see if it's still running
that error ususally only happens under 2 cases 1) if the conf file has been deleted or the user/pass in it has been deleted after running, as CHMEX suggested, or 2) the daemon is not running for that chain

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: Perhaps that error has never happened in KMD world because Hush goes down a different code path of librustzcash. That must be it

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: Yes. Currently there is a search path to check many places, and it seems that checking the system path before the local path gives risk of old corrupt/partially downloaded param files causing this error. Potentially.

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: Hush has a fork of librustzcash

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: so we have a codepath nobody else has
